product_name: Power Practical PowerPot V Recharging Cook Pot
long_description: Stay connected even at your campsite. The Power Practical PowerPot(R) V Recharging Cook Pot easily powers your phone, GPS unit or music player by converting heat into electrical power. PowerPot V charges a cell phone in 60-90 minutes, or can be used to power any USB handheld device. Pot delivers 5 watts of power and works over any heat source, including open flame. PowerPot includes a 1.4 liter pot with lid (lid also doubles as a bowl); heavy-duty, flame-resistant 3 ft. cable with 3 different ports to accomodate different devices. Pot and lid each feature heat-resistant handles that fold down for easy packing. The Power Practical PowerPot V Recharging Cook Pot is made from lightweight, durable anodized aluminum.
short_description: Stay connected even at your campsite. The Power Practical PowerPot(R) V Recharging Cook Pot easily powers your phone, GPS unit or music player by converting heat into electrical power.
